articles.author: Bradford Betz
articles.title: German teen missing for 2 years found in closet of suspected pedophile, police say
articles.description: A 15-year-old German boy was found Friday in the closet of a suspected pedophile two and a half years after he went missing, local authorities say.
articles.content:
A 15-year-old German boy was found Friday in the closet of a suspected pedophile two and a half years after he went missing, local authorities say.
Police in Recklinghausen was conducting a search of the 44-year-old suspect’s house when they found the teen h… [+1197 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Sorace
articles.title: Shark bites surfer off California coast in ‘truly terrifying’ encounter: officials
articles.description: A surfer is expected to survive after a shark bit the man off the coast of Southern California on Saturday in what officials have described as “a truly terrifying situation.”
articles.content:
A surfer is expected to survive after a shark bit the man off the coast of Southern California on Saturday in what officials have described as “a truly terrifying situation.”

articles.title: 'Real Housewives' star Teresa Giudice spotted with ex Tony Delorenzo after announcing separation from husband
articles.description: It looks like Teresa Giudice is moving on.
articles.content:
It looks like Teresa Giudice is moving on.
